channel.title: Midi in to Midi out (DIN)
channel.description:
Hi,
how can i route all Midi DIN In Data directly to the Midi DIN Out ?
Best
Mario

item.title: Midi in to Midi out (DIN)
item.dc:creator: @SynthProject Mario Jurisch
item.description:
@SynthProject wrote:

O.K. Thanks. I tried it, but it doesn't work. I think I make some mistakes.
Is there a hardware solution for it, without using the patcher.

I wanna send the data of a master keyboard with pitch and mod wheel directly to the DIN Output.

Read full topic

item.title: Midi in to Midi out (DIN)
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

You can adapt this midi/in/script to relay DIN midi in to DIN midi out:

Axoloti as a MIDI USB host?

You can test this little midi/in/script midi_usbh_to_din.axp (1.2 KB) I have not tested this. It does not do MIDI System Common Messages or MIDI System Real-Time Messages, like midi clock, or sysex. Please reply if this works or not!

Read full topic

item.title: Midi in to Midi out (DIN)
item.dc:creator: @floodcomics www.floodcomics.com
item.description:
@floodcomics wrote:

I would think you just make the following objects: midi/in/cc, midi/in/keyb, midi/in/clock, midi/in/bend and midi/out/cc, midi/out/note, midi/out/clock, midi/out/bend and connect them respectively.
Only just started with Axoloti today though so there is probably a better way.

Read full topic
